content: Create STATE/ directory with ROOT.yaml and VERSIONS.yaml
Create agents/ directory with all subdirectories (definitions, workflows, tools, playbooks)
Create intelligence/ directory with subdirectories (conversations, analysis, synthesis, memory)
Create workflows/ directory with subdirectories (daily, research, content, monitoring)
Create contracts/ directory with subdirectories (agents, external, workflows)
Create CONTEXT/ directory with subdirectories (workspace, prompts, knowledge)
Create policies/ directory with subdirectories (productivity, quality, security)
Create ops/ directory with subdirectories (hooks, monitoring, deployment)
Create GENERATED/ directory with subdirectories (reports, content, insights)
